item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 8)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 10)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 7)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Miller (Level 8)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 965 times with git add -p.

item.title: Cathedral Architect (Level 4)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.title: Butcher (Level 5)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 10)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 3)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 1)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Author (Level 10)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 7)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Collector (Level 6)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Cleaning lady (Level 7)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Tree Trimmer (Level 2)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Apprentice Tree Trimmer (Level 1)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 10)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 6)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.
